name: Grim Reaper
description:
Description

Grim Reaper is an action plateformer game. You play Grim, a Reaper fighting for wolrd's balance.

Game features :  

  • Switch between life and death
  • Nervous combats
  • Scythe upgrade
  • Speed run mode
  • Play with keyboard or controller

We are first year students and this is our first game. Don't be afraid to list every defaults we can change to improve our games.

Send us a mail at crimsonscythe.studio@gmail.com or check out our Twitter : @CrmScytheStudio

You can check our school website to test other students game : https://www.creajeux.fr/en/

Have fun!
